Xmouse.h

00001 /* MOUSE HEADER FILE   */
00002 int moux,mouy;
00003 union REGS regs;
00004 void Init_Mouse();
00005 void Show_Mouse_Pointer();
00006 void Hide_Pointer();
00007 int Detect_Left_Click();
00008 
00009 int Detect_Right_Click();
00010 int Detect_Mouse_Movement();
00011 void Init_Mouse()
00012 {int midx, midy, i;
00013  regs.x.ax=0;    /*check existance of mouse*/
00014  int86(0x33,&regs,&regs);
00015  if(regs.x.ax==0)
00016   system("mouse>NUL");
00017  regs.x.ax=1;   /*activate mouse pointer*/
00018  int86(0x33,&regs,&regs);
00019  regs.x.ax=15;
00020  regs.x.cx=50;
00021  regs.x.dx=50;
00022 }
00023 void Show_Mouse_Pointer()
00024 {regs.x.ax=1;   /*activate mouse pointer*/
00025  int86(0x33,&regs,&regs);
00026  regs.x.ax=15;
00027  regs.x.cx=50;
00028  regs.x.dx=50;
00029 }
00030 int Detect_Left_Click()
00031 {int midx, midy;
00032  regs.x.ax=3;
00033  int86(0x33,&regs,&regs);
00034  midx=regs.x.cx;
00035  midy=regs.x.dx;
00036  if(regs.x.bx & 1)
00037  {moux=midx;
00038   mouy=midy;
00039   return 1;
00040  }
00041  else return 0;
00042 }
00043 int Detect_Mouse_Movement()
00044 {int midx, midy;
00045  regs.x.ax=3;
00046  int86(0x33,&regs,&regs);
00047  midx=regs.x.cx;
00048  midy=regs.x.dx;
00049  if(midx==moux&&midy==mouy)
00050   return 0;
00051  else{moux=midx;
00052       mouy=midy;
00053       return 1;
00054      }
00055 }
00056 void Hide_Pointer()
00057 {regs.x.ax=2;
00058  int86(0x33,&regs,&regs);
00059 }
00060 int Detect_Right_Click()
00061 {int midx, midy;
00062  regs.x.ax=3;
00063  int86(0x33,&regs,&regs);
00064  midx=regs.x.cx;
00065  midy=regs.x.dx;
00066  if((regs.x.bx & 2)&&(!(regs.x.bx & 1)))
00067  {moux=midx;
00068   mouy=midy;
00069   return 1;
00070  }
00071  else return 0;
00072 }
